name: Advanced Form Integration – Connect WooCommerce and Contact Form 7 to Google Sheets and other platforms
author: nasirahmed

sections.description:
AFI is a simple tool that links your website forms to various other platforms. It can connect with email marketing, CRM, spreadsheets, task management, and various software. When someone fills out a form, AFI makes sure the information goes to these other programs. AFI isn’t just for forms; it can also connect with other plugins like WooCommerce, LearnDash, GiveWP, etc.

  • Easy to use: The plugin was created, keeping not-tech people in mind. Setting up new integrations is a breeze and can be accomplished within minutes. No coding skill is required, almost no learning curve.

  • Flexible: Integrations can be created from any sender platform to any receiver platform. You can create as many connections as you want—single sender to multiple receivers, multiple senders to a single receiver, multiple senders to multiple receivers. Just keep in mind that all PHP server has a maximum execution time allowed.

  • Conditional Logic: You can create single or multiple conditional logic to filter the data flow. Submitted data will only be sent if the conditions match. For example, when you want to send contact data only if the user has agreed and filed the checkbox “I agree” (Contact Form 7 acceptance field) or if the city is only New York or the subject contacts the word “Lead,” etc. You can set up the conditions as you like.

  • Special Tags: We have introduced several special tags that can be passed to receiver platforms. These are helpful when you want some more information that the user submitted, like IP address, user agent, etc. Example: {{_date}} same format and timezone that is saved in WordPress settings, {{_time}} same format and timezone that is saved in WordPress settings, {{_weekday}} weekday like Monday, Tuesday, etc., {{_user_ip}}, {{_user_agent}}, {{_site_title}}, {{_site_description}}, {{_site_url}}, {{_site_admin_email}}, {{_post_id}}, {{_post_name}}, {{_post_title}}, {{_post_url}}, {{_user_id}}, {{_user_first_name}}, {{_user_last_name}}, {{_user_last_name}}, {{_user_email}}.

  • Job Queue: Leverage the proven reliability of Action Scheduler for seamless background processing of extensive task queues within WordPress. Activate this functionality in AFI settings to improve the submission process and ensure a smooth user experience.

  • Multisite: Multisite supported.

  • Log: A powerful log feature with an edit and resend function. If somethings goes wrong on a submission, the admin can go to the log, edit/correct the data and resend it.

[Website] [Documentation] [Tutorial Videos] [Comparison]

SENDER PLATFORMS (TRIGGER)

The following plugins work as a sender platform.

  • Academy LMS: Triggers when students enroll a new course, complete a lesson.

  • AffiliateWP: Triggers on different AffiliateWP events.

  • Amelia Booking: Triggers when an appointment or event is booked. Works with both free and paid versions of Amelia. Amelia Pro also triggers on changes to the booking status, reschedules, or cancellations.

  • ARForms: Basic fields support.

  • Beaver Builder Form: Triggers on form submission.

  • BuddyBoss: Triggers on various BuddyBoss events like firendship requested or accepted, new topic or reply, join or leave group, membership requested or accepted and more.

  • Caldera Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Contact Form 7: Any contact form created using Contact Form 7 can be integrated. So when a user submits the form, data will be sent to connected platforms.

  • ConvertPro Forms

  • Divi Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Elementor Pro Form: Basic fields support.

  • Everest Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Fluent Forms: Basic fields support.

  • FormCraft: Basic fields support.

  • Formidable Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Forminator (Forms only): Basic fields support.

  • GiveWP: Triggers on several events in GiveWP like new donation, cancel recurring, etc.

  • Gravity Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Happyforms: Basic fields support.

  • Kadence Blocks Form: Triggers on submission.

  • LearnDash: Triggers on several events in LearnDash like enroll, unenroll, lesson complete or quiz attempt.

  • LifterLMS: Triggers on several events in LifterLMS like enroll, unenroll, lesson complete or quiz attempt, pass, fail, etc.

  • Live Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Metform: Basic fields support.

  • Ninja Forms: Basic fields support.

  • TutorLMS: Triggers on enroll, lesson complete, course complete, quiz attempt.

  • QuForm: Basic fields support.

  • Smart Forms: Basic fields support.

  • weForms: Basic fields support.

  • WPForms: Basic fields support.

  • Gravity Forms: Basic fields support.

  • WooCommerce

  • UTM Parameters: You can also grab and send UTM variables. Just activate the feature from the plugin’s settings page. Now use tags like {{utm_source}}, {{utm_medium}}, {{utm_term}}, {{utm_content}}, {{utm_campaign}}, {{gclid}}, etc.

Premium Version Features.

  • All form fields
  • Inbound Webhooks

RECEIVER PLATFORMS (ACTION)

  • Acelle Mail – Creates contact and adds to a list. Requires a pro license to use custom fields and tags.

  • ActiveCampaign – ActiveCampaign is a popular email marketing and automation platform. This plugin allows you to integrate it with any sender platform, so when a user submits the form with personal details, it will automatically create a contact in ActiveCampaign. The contact can be added to a list or automation. Additionally, deals and notes can be created, too, for that contact. Requires a pro license to use custom fields.

  • Agile CRM – This plugin allows creating contact, deal and note. Requires a pro license to use tags and custom fields.

  • Airtable – Creates new row to selected table.

  • Asana – Allows to create a new task. Custom fields are support in the AFI Pro version.

  • Autopilot – This plugin allows creating/updating contact and adding to a list. Requires a pro license to use custom fields.

  • AWeber – Allows to create contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and tags.

  • beehiiv – Create new subscriber to a selected publiction.

  • Benchmark Email – Allows to create contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • Campaign Monitor – Allows to create contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • Capsule CRM – Supports adding party, opportunity, case, and task. Requires the Pro version to add tags, and custom fields.

  • ClinchPad CRM – Creates new Lead including organization, contact, note, product, etc.

  • Close CRM – Close is the inside sales CRM of choice for startups and SMBs. You can add a new lead and contact to Close CRM. The Pro version supports custom fields.

  • CompanyHub – Creates basic contact.

  • Constant Contact – Allows you to create new contacts and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and tags.

  • ConvertKit – ConvetKit is another popular email marketing software. This plugin allows you to create a new contact and subscribe to a sequence or form. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and tags.

  • Copper CRM – This allows you to create a new company, person, and deal in Copper CRM. The Pro version supports custom fields and tags.

  • ClickUp – Create tasks. Requires a Pro license to add tags and custom fields.

  • Curated – Add subscriber.

  • Demio – Register people to webinar.

  • DirectIQ – Allows you to create contact and add to the mailing list.

  • Drip – Create Contact (Basic Fields), add to Campaign, Workflow. The Pro version supports custom fields.

  • EasySendy – This allows you to create contact and add them to the mailing list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Elastic Email – Elastic Email is a marketing platform built on the most cost-effective delivery engine. You can create a contact and add it to a mailing list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • EmailOctopus – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • EngageBay – Create new contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • EverWebinar – Add registrant to webinar.

  • Freshworks CRM (Freshsales) – Freshworks CRM is a full-fledged Sales CRM software for your business. This plugin allows you to create accounts, contact, and deals with custom fields.

  • GetResponse – GetResponse is a powerful, simplified tool to send emails, create pages, and automate your marketing. This plugin allows you to create a subscriber and add it to the mailing list The Pro version supports custom fields and tags.

  • Google Calendar – Allows you to create a new event on a selected Google Calendar with supplied data.

  • Google Sheets – When a sender form is submitted, or a WooCommerce order is created, this plugin allows you to create a new row on a selected sheet with supplied data. In the Pro version, it is allowed to create separate rows for WooCommerce Order Items. For example, if an order has 5 items so 5 separate rows will be created for each item.

  • Hubspot CRM – Allows you to create a new contact in Hubspot CRM with additional custom fields support. The AFI Pro supports creating companies, deals, tickets, tasks, etc.

  • Insightly – Create New organisation, contact and opportunity with basic fields. The Pro plugin supports custom fields and tags.

  • Jumplead – Jumplead offers a full all-in-one inbound marketing automation platform. This plugin allows adding a contact to it.

  • Klaviyo – Klaviyo is an email marketing platform created for online businesses — featuring powerful email and SMS marketing automation. Using Advanced Form Integration, you can add a contact, and subscribe to a list. Pro license is required to use custom properties.

  • lemlist – A cold email tool powering sales teams, agencies, and B2B businesses to personalize and automate outreach campaigns. This plugin allows creating contact and adds it to a campaign.

  • LionDesk – LionDesk offers sales and marketing automation for Real Estate Agents and Brokers. Creating a new contact is supported using our plugin. In the Pro version, you can add tags and custom fields.

  • Livestorm – Add people to event session.

  • MailBluster – Creates new lead. Requires Pro license to use Custom fields, and tags.

  • Mailchimp – Allows you to create contacts, subscribe to a list and group, and unsubscribe from the list. Requires Pro license to use Custom|Merge fields, and tags.

  • Mailercloud – Adds new subscribers to a selected lists. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • MailerLite – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a group. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • MailerLite Classic – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a group. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Mailify – Mailify is a email marketing solution. This plugin allows you to create contacts and subscribe to lists. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Mailjet – Allows you to create a contact and add it to a list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • MailWizz – Create contact and add to a list. The Pro plugin supports custom fields.

  • Mautic – Allows you to create a contact. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Moosend – Allows you to create a contact and add it to a list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Omnisend – Create new contacts. Requires pro license to use custom fields and tags.

  • Onehash.ai – The plugin allows you to create new leads, contacts, and customers.

  • Ortto – Allows creating contact. Requires a pro license to use tags and custom fields.

  • Pabbly Email Marketing – Allows you to create a subscriber and add it to a list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Pipedrive – This plugin allows you to create organizations, people, deals, notes, activity with custom fields support. Requires a Pro license to add new lead.

  • Pushover – Allows you to send push messages to Android/iOS/Desktop.

  • Robly – Add/update new subscriber. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields and tags.

  • Sales.Rocks – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a list.

  • Salesflare – Allows you to create organization, contact, opportunity and task.

  • Selzy – Create new contact and subscribe to a list. The Pro version supports custom fields and tags.

  • SendFox – Allows you to create contact and subscribe to a list. Custom fields can be added in the Pro version.

  • SendPulse – Allows you to create contact and subscribe to a list.

  • Brevo (Sendinblue) – Brevo (formerly Sendinblue) is a complete all-in-one digital marketing toolbox. Our plugin allows you to create subscribers and add them to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and other languages.

  • SendX – Allows you to create new contact.

  • Sendy – Allows creating contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • Slack – Allows sending channel message.

  • Smartsheet – Allows creating new row.

  • Trello – This plugin allows you to create a new card in Trello.

  • Twilio – This plugin allows you to send customized SMS using Twilio.

  • Vertical Response – This plugin allows creating contacts in a certain list. Requires a pro license to use custom fields.

  • Wealthbox CRM – This plugin allows creating contacts. Requires a pro license to use tags and custom fields.

  • Webhook – Allows you to send data to any webhook URL. In the Pro version, you can send fully customized headers and body (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), literally can send data to any API with API token and Basic auth.

  • WebinarJam – Add registrant to webinar.

  • Woodpecker.co – Allows creating subscriber. Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • WordPress – Create new post.

  • Zapier – Sends data to Zapier webhook.

  • Zoho Campaigns – Allows creating subscribers and adding to a list. Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Zoho Bigin – Allows creating Contacts, Companies, Pipelines, Tasks, Notes, etc. Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Zoho CRM – Allows creating Leads, Contacts, Accounts, Deals, Tasks, Meetings, Calls, Products, Campaigns, Vendors, Cases and Solution . Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Zoho Desk

  • Zoho Sheet – Creates a new row on selected worksheet.
sections.installation:
Automatic Install From WordPress Dashboard

  1. log in to your admin panel
  2. Navigate to Plugins -> Add New
  3. Search Advanced Form Integration
  4. Click install and then active.

Manual Install

  1. Download the plugin by clicking on the Download button above. A ZIP file will be downloaded.
  2. Login to your site’s admin panel and navigate to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  3. Click choose file, select the plugin file and click install
sections.faq:
Why I can’t see Contact Form 7 in the dropdown list?

Make sure that Contact Form 7 is installed and activated.

Connection error, how can I re-authorize Google Sheets?

If authorization is broken/not working for some reason, try re-authorizing. Please go to https://myaccount.google.com/permissions, remove app permission then authorize again from plugin settings.

Getting “The requested URL was not found on this server” error while authorizing Google Sheets

Please check the permalink settings in WordPress. Go to Settings > Permalinks > select Post name then Save.

Do I need to map all fields while creating integration?

No, but required fields must be mapped.

Can I add additional text while field mapping?

Sure, you can. It is possible to mix static text and form field placeholder tags. Placeholder tags will be replaced with original data after form submission.

How can I get support?

For any query, feel free to send an email to support@advancedformintegration.com.

sections.reviews:
Fantastic Service - Great App

By carlmes on April 14, 2024

The team at AFI is amazing! They have been very responsive, and gone the extra mile to help answer all questions and resolve every bug we came across. With any app, the support is critical since software always has bugs. I was able to integrate multiple apps with AFI, and I am very pleased with the results.

Great plugin

By usifidel on March 16, 2024

This plugin is very helpful, the developer is always open for recommendation and the support is exceptional. Highly recommend!

Works well and great support

By asantamzid on March 15, 2024

I love this plugin cause it works well and the support is great.

Fantastic Pluging, Support is the best I have seen

By elementador on March 14, 2024

This plugin solves all kind of flexibility issues I had with Engagebay. Engagebay is a fantastic platform, but their API code is slowing my website down a lot. So I chose an integration via AFI... it works like a charm, and if not, or you have special requests, Nasir, the plugin builder always responds fast, and I mean really fast. Within an hour, max few hours and changing or updating functionality if needed. His job must be hard, all the platforms he integrates are moving objects for a developer. And still he is successful.
Really fantastic to work with and the license money more than worth it!
Thank you Nasir for making my work much easier!

Great plugin and fantastic support

By Helaku (helaku) on March 13, 2024

For a Contact Form 7/Campaign Monitor integration, I purchased the pro version. Following Nasir's detailed documentation, the installation of the plugin as well as configuring the integration went like a breeze.

I did, however, come across a small issue with a Campaign Monitor custom field. Within a few hours, Nasir released a plugin update, which not only improved the integration interface, but also fixed my custom field issue.

A huge thank you to Nasir, for creating this great, intuitive plugin, and for the outstanding support!

The best! Nasir offers incredible support

By seriouswebdesign on January 17, 2024

I purchased the Pro version of the plugin as I needed it to create multiple records in my spreadsheet. I ran into an issue where a deposits plugin was not compatible with the afi plugin. Nasir could have easily washed his hands of it but instead worked tirelessly along with Acowebs in order to come up with a fix. Absolutely incredible support and he has kept me informed every step of the way.

The plugin is so useful as all of my woocommerce orders now go into a google sheet. It's very flexible and can be set up with various logic conditions.

I have also bought the Acowebs product form customiser which means that all of this custom product data seamlessly goes into my google sheet making it really powerful.

Highly recommend it!

Works well and fast support

By AtDevep on November 14, 2023

I use Advanced Form Integration Pro version to integrate WPForms and Pipedrive. Plugin works great and I had fast and polite support when I needed help. Thank you!

Best ever support

By billhodgson on September 13, 2023

The developer helped me connect Wordpress and Woocommerce to AWeber using a custom field, to enable me to tell email receivers their unique membership ID. He responded to an email within minutes and actually went into my Dev site to solve this for me. Total five star service.

Excellent choice for contact forms

By rashvin on July 13, 2023

I've been using CF7 for long time, it's an excellent plugin for many of my websites and I've complete control over the plugin with regular updates. Thank you developers.

Great service support

By mejoraminegocio on June 13, 2023

We are using the pro version of the plugin and had an error updating contacts. Great technical support solved it in less than 24h

short_description: Send WooCommerce order data & Contact Form 7 submissions to many other platforms.
description:
AFI is a simple tool that links your website forms to various other platforms. It can connect with email marketing, CRM, spreadsheets, task management, and various software. When someone fills out a form, AFI makes sure the information goes to these other programs. AFI isn’t just for forms; it can also connect with other plugins like WooCommerce, LearnDash, GiveWP, etc.

  • Easy to use: The plugin was created, keeping not-tech people in mind. Setting up new integrations is a breeze and can be accomplished within minutes. No coding skill is required, almost no learning curve.

  • Flexible: Integrations can be created from any sender platform to any receiver platform. You can create as many connections as you want—single sender to multiple receivers, multiple senders to a single receiver, multiple senders to multiple receivers. Just keep in mind that all PHP server has a maximum execution time allowed.

  • Conditional Logic: You can create single or multiple conditional logic to filter the data flow. Submitted data will only be sent if the conditions match. For example, when you want to send contact data only if the user has agreed and filed the checkbox “I agree” (Contact Form 7 acceptance field) or if the city is only New York or the subject contacts the word “Lead,” etc. You can set up the conditions as you like.

  • Special Tags: We have introduced several special tags that can be passed to receiver platforms. These are helpful when you want some more information that the user submitted, like IP address, user agent, etc. Example: {{_date}} same format and timezone that is saved in WordPress settings, {{_time}} same format and timezone that is saved in WordPress settings, {{_weekday}} weekday like Monday, Tuesday, etc., {{_user_ip}}, {{_user_agent}}, {{_site_title}}, {{_site_description}}, {{_site_url}}, {{_site_admin_email}}, {{_post_id}}, {{_post_name}}, {{_post_title}}, {{_post_url}}, {{_user_id}}, {{_user_first_name}}, {{_user_last_name}}, {{_user_last_name}}, {{_user_email}}.

  • Job Queue: Leverage the proven reliability of Action Scheduler for seamless background processing of extensive task queues within WordPress. Activate this functionality in AFI settings to improve the submission process and ensure a smooth user experience.

  • Multisite: Multisite supported.

  • Log: A powerful log feature with an edit and resend function. If somethings goes wrong on a submission, the admin can go to the log, edit/correct the data and resend it.

[Website] [Documentation] [Tutorial Videos] [Comparison]

SENDER PLATFORMS (TRIGGER)

The following plugins work as a sender platform.

  • Academy LMS: Triggers when students enroll a new course, complete a lesson.

  • AffiliateWP: Triggers on different AffiliateWP events.

  • Amelia Booking: Triggers when an appointment or event is booked. Works with both free and paid versions of Amelia. Amelia Pro also triggers on changes to the booking status, reschedules, or cancellations.

  • ARForms: Basic fields support.

  • Beaver Builder Form: Triggers on form submission.

  • BuddyBoss: Triggers on various BuddyBoss events like firendship requested or accepted, new topic or reply, join or leave group, membership requested or accepted and more.

  • Caldera Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Contact Form 7: Any contact form created using Contact Form 7 can be integrated. So when a user submits the form, data will be sent to connected platforms.

  • ConvertPro Forms

  • Divi Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Elementor Pro Form: Basic fields support.

  • Everest Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Fluent Forms: Basic fields support.

  • FormCraft: Basic fields support.

  • Formidable Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Forminator (Forms only): Basic fields support.

  • GiveWP: Triggers on several events in GiveWP like new donation, cancel recurring, etc.

  • Gravity Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Happyforms: Basic fields support.

  • Kadence Blocks Form: Triggers on submission.

  • LearnDash: Triggers on several events in LearnDash like enroll, unenroll, lesson complete or quiz attempt.

  • LifterLMS: Triggers on several events in LifterLMS like enroll, unenroll, lesson complete or quiz attempt, pass, fail, etc.

  • Live Forms: Basic fields support.

  • Metform: Basic fields support.

  • Ninja Forms: Basic fields support.

  • TutorLMS: Triggers on enroll, lesson complete, course complete, quiz attempt.

  • QuForm: Basic fields support.

  • Smart Forms: Basic fields support.

  • weForms: Basic fields support.

  • WPForms: Basic fields support.

  • Gravity Forms: Basic fields support.

  • WooCommerce

  • UTM Parameters: You can also grab and send UTM variables. Just activate the feature from the plugin’s settings page. Now use tags like {{utm_source}}, {{utm_medium}}, {{utm_term}}, {{utm_content}}, {{utm_campaign}}, {{gclid}}, etc.

Premium Version Features.

  • All form fields
  • Inbound Webhooks

RECEIVER PLATFORMS (ACTION)

  • Acelle Mail – Creates contact and adds to a list. Requires a pro license to use custom fields and tags.

  • ActiveCampaign – ActiveCampaign is a popular email marketing and automation platform. This plugin allows you to integrate it with any sender platform, so when a user submits the form with personal details, it will automatically create a contact in ActiveCampaign. The contact can be added to a list or automation. Additionally, deals and notes can be created, too, for that contact. Requires a pro license to use custom fields.

  • Agile CRM – This plugin allows creating contact, deal and note. Requires a pro license to use tags and custom fields.

  • Airtable – Creates new row to selected table.

  • Asana – Allows to create a new task. Custom fields are support in the AFI Pro version.

  • Autopilot – This plugin allows creating/updating contact and adding to a list. Requires a pro license to use custom fields.

  • AWeber – Allows to create contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and tags.

  • beehiiv – Create new subscriber to a selected publiction.

  • Benchmark Email – Allows to create contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • Campaign Monitor – Allows to create contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • Capsule CRM – Supports adding party, opportunity, case, and task. Requires the Pro version to add tags, and custom fields.

  • ClinchPad CRM – Creates new Lead including organization, contact, note, product, etc.

  • Close CRM – Close is the inside sales CRM of choice for startups and SMBs. You can add a new lead and contact to Close CRM. The Pro version supports custom fields.

  • CompanyHub – Creates basic contact.

  • Constant Contact – Allows you to create new contacts and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and tags.

  • ConvertKit – ConvetKit is another popular email marketing software. This plugin allows you to create a new contact and subscribe to a sequence or form. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and tags.

  • Copper CRM – This allows you to create a new company, person, and deal in Copper CRM. The Pro version supports custom fields and tags.

  • ClickUp – Create tasks. Requires a Pro license to add tags and custom fields.

  • Curated – Add subscriber.

  • Demio – Register people to webinar.

  • DirectIQ – Allows you to create contact and add to the mailing list.

  • Drip – Create Contact (Basic Fields), add to Campaign, Workflow. The Pro version supports custom fields.

  • EasySendy – This allows you to create contact and add them to the mailing list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Elastic Email – Elastic Email is a marketing platform built on the most cost-effective delivery engine. You can create a contact and add it to a mailing list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • EmailOctopus – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • EngageBay – Create new contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • EverWebinar – Add registrant to webinar.

  • Freshworks CRM (Freshsales) – Freshworks CRM is a full-fledged Sales CRM software for your business. This plugin allows you to create accounts, contact, and deals with custom fields.

  • GetResponse – GetResponse is a powerful, simplified tool to send emails, create pages, and automate your marketing. This plugin allows you to create a subscriber and add it to the mailing list The Pro version supports custom fields and tags.

  • Google Calendar – Allows you to create a new event on a selected Google Calendar with supplied data.

  • Google Sheets – When a sender form is submitted, or a WooCommerce order is created, this plugin allows you to create a new row on a selected sheet with supplied data. In the Pro version, it is allowed to create separate rows for WooCommerce Order Items. For example, if an order has 5 items so 5 separate rows will be created for each item.

  • Hubspot CRM – Allows you to create a new contact in Hubspot CRM with additional custom fields support. The AFI Pro supports creating companies, deals, tickets, tasks, etc.

  • Insightly – Create New organisation, contact and opportunity with basic fields. The Pro plugin supports custom fields and tags.

  • Jumplead – Jumplead offers a full all-in-one inbound marketing automation platform. This plugin allows adding a contact to it.

  • Klaviyo – Klaviyo is an email marketing platform created for online businesses — featuring powerful email and SMS marketing automation. Using Advanced Form Integration, you can add a contact, and subscribe to a list. Pro license is required to use custom properties.

  • lemlist – A cold email tool powering sales teams, agencies, and B2B businesses to personalize and automate outreach campaigns. This plugin allows creating contact and adds it to a campaign.

  • LionDesk – LionDesk offers sales and marketing automation for Real Estate Agents and Brokers. Creating a new contact is supported using our plugin. In the Pro version, you can add tags and custom fields.

  • Livestorm – Add people to event session.

  • MailBluster – Creates new lead. Requires Pro license to use Custom fields, and tags.

  • Mailchimp – Allows you to create contacts, subscribe to a list and group, and unsubscribe from the list. Requires Pro license to use Custom|Merge fields, and tags.

  • Mailercloud – Adds new subscribers to a selected lists. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • MailerLite – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a group. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • MailerLite Classic – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a group. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Mailify – Mailify is a email marketing solution. This plugin allows you to create contacts and subscribe to lists. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Mailjet – Allows you to create a contact and add it to a list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • MailWizz – Create contact and add to a list. The Pro plugin supports custom fields.

  • Mautic – Allows you to create a contact. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Moosend – Allows you to create a contact and add it to a list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Omnisend – Create new contacts. Requires pro license to use custom fields and tags.

  • Onehash.ai – The plugin allows you to create new leads, contacts, and customers.

  • Ortto – Allows creating contact. Requires a pro license to use tags and custom fields.

  • Pabbly Email Marketing – Allows you to create a subscriber and add it to a list. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Pipedrive – This plugin allows you to create organizations, people, deals, notes, activity with custom fields support. Requires a Pro license to add new lead.

  • Pushover – Allows you to send push messages to Android/iOS/Desktop.

  • Robly – Add/update new subscriber. Requires a Pro license to use custom fields and tags.

  • Sales.Rocks – Allows you to add contact and subscribe to a list.

  • Salesflare – Allows you to create organization, contact, opportunity and task.

  • Selzy – Create new contact and subscribe to a list. The Pro version supports custom fields and tags.

  • SendFox – Allows you to create contact and subscribe to a list. Custom fields can be added in the Pro version.

  • SendPulse – Allows you to create contact and subscribe to a list.

  • Brevo (Sendinblue) – Brevo (formerly Sendinblue) is a complete all-in-one digital marketing toolbox. Our plugin allows you to create subscribers and add them to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields and other languages.

  • SendX – Allows you to create new contact.

  • Sendy – Allows creating contact and subscribe to a list. A Pro license is required to use custom fields.

  • Slack – Allows sending channel message.

  • Smartsheet – Allows creating new row.

  • Trello – This plugin allows you to create a new card in Trello.

  • Twilio – This plugin allows you to send customized SMS using Twilio.

  • Vertical Response – This plugin allows creating contacts in a certain list. Requires a pro license to use custom fields.

  • Wealthbox CRM – This plugin allows creating contacts. Requires a pro license to use tags and custom fields.

  • Webhook – Allows you to send data to any webhook URL. In the Pro version, you can send fully customized headers and body (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), literally can send data to any API with API token and Basic auth.

  • WebinarJam – Add registrant to webinar.

  • Woodpecker.co – Allows creating subscriber. Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • WordPress – Create new post.

  • Zapier – Sends data to Zapier webhook.

  • Zoho Campaigns – Allows creating subscribers and adding to a list. Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Zoho Bigin – Allows creating Contacts, Companies, Pipelines, Tasks, Notes, etc. Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Zoho CRM – Allows creating Leads, Contacts, Accounts, Deals, Tasks, Meetings, Calls, Products, Campaigns, Vendors, Cases and Solution . Requires Pro license to use custom fields.

  • Zoho Desk

  • Zoho Sheet – Creates a new row on selected worksheet.
